src:
Kerja Keras! Target Investasi Sisa Akhir Tahun Masih Rp 191 T Lagi
01 Nov 2019, 00:20 by Trio Hamdani


Foto: Ilustrasi: Luthfi Syahban

Jakarta - Realisasi investasi di Indonesia pada triwulan III-1019 naik 18,4% dibandingkan periode yang sama tahun lalu. Realisasi investasi tercatat sebesar Rp 205,7 triliun, sementara triwulan yang sama tahun lalu Rp 173,8 triliun.Hal tersebut diumumkan oleh Badan Koordinasi Penanaman Modal (BKPM) dalam jumpa pers di Kantor BKPM, Jakarta Selatan, Kamis (31/10/2019).Lantas apakah target yang telah ditetapkan bisa dipenuhi di sisa satu triwulan atau 3 bulan terakhir di 2019? Sementara bila dihitung dari sekarang, sisa waktunya 2 bulan lagi.Simak informasi selengkapnya di halaman selanjutnya. (toy/eds)
text:
Hard work! The remaining year-end investment target is still Rp. 191 T again
Nov 01 2019, 00:20 by Trio Hamdani


Photo: Illustration: Lutfi Syahban

Jakarta - Realization of investment in Indonesia in the third quarter-1019 rose 18.4% compared to the same period last year. Investment realization was recorded at Rp 205.7 trillion, while the same quarter last year was Rp 173.8 trillion. This was announced by the Investment Coordinating Board (BKPM) during a press conference at the BKPM Office, South Jakarta, Thursday (10/31/2019 ). Then can the target be set in the remaining quarter or the last 3 months in 2019? Meanwhile, if calculated from now, the remaining time is 2 months. See more information on the next page. (toy / eds)
